price: ߕߋߙߌߢߐ߲߯ߡߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߏ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߏ ߖߎ߮ ߘߌ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߝߏ߫ ߝߊ߲ߕߊ߲ߞߟߊ ߟߎ߬ ߘߐߙߐ߲߫
arabic: ٱلۡأَخِلَّآءُ يَوۡمَئِذِۭ بَعۡضُهُمۡ لِبَعۡضٍ عَدُوٌّ إِلَّا ٱلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: al-akhilāu yawma-idhin baʿḍuhum libaʿḍin ʿaduwwun illā al-mutaqīna
